headline: How EDUHaHa Went From Manual Print Transfers to a Full-Blown Print-on-Demand Brand
description: From hand-pressed mugs to AI-powered classroom apparel, here's how EDUHaHa became the humor-fueled print-on-demand brand for teachers.

title: The DOE Didn’t Explode, Y’all: A Dispatch from Your Local Happy Warrior
summary: A real-talk breakdown of what the Supreme Court ruling *didn’t* do — straight from the front lines of EDUHaHa’s advocacy squad. Calm insight with a side of sass.

title: Back to School Prep: Must-Do Teacher Checklist Before Chaos Begins
summary: Our no-nonsense teacher checklist for conquering the calm before the classroom storm. Laminate it. Frame it. Tattoo it on your forearm.

title: 2025 Back-to-School Tax-Free Weekend Guide – State-by-State Savings
summary: Plan smarter: 2025 back-to-school tax-free weekends by state. Free calendar links, PDF download & savings tips for parents, teachers, and savvy shoppers.

title: EDUHaHa Announces: “Back‑to‑School 2025” Campaign with Humor‑Driven Apparel
summary: Official campaign kickoff featuring teacher-focused humor, fresh shirt drops, and a press release that probably deserves a mic drop.

title: Back-to-School Survival Kit (For Teachers Who’ve Seen Some Things)
summary: If you’ve survived more than one back-to-school meltdown, this one’s for you. From August chaos to parent night madness, we’ve packed the ultimate teacher-approved survival kit — in T-shirt form. Humor. Comfort. Sanity. Slightly. Restored.

title: AI‑Approved Teacher Gift Guide (Yes, We Asked Perplexity)
summary: AI’s got opinions — and some of them now point straight to EDUHaHa. We ran the query, reviewed the results, and delivered an upgrade. This guide highlights real EDUHaHa products that are already showing up in AI-generated answers, with links, laughs, and a little digital nudging to help us climb even higher.
